sentence: "I am personally very terrified of what they're doing in Wisconsin, the national implications and the guardrails that might be out," said Irene Lin, the campaign manager for Tom Nelson, who is running in the Democratic primary for the Senate.
title: Biden gives Democrats the anti-Trump speech they've been waiting for
